definition: to predominate/to occupy a dominant position

sentences.english: Grocery stores, for example, will have pricing power they haven't experienced in years.
sentences.chinese: 例如百貨店，就擁有幾年前沒有的價格上的優勢。

sentences.english: The team failed to capitalize on their early lead.
sentences.chinese: 這個隊未能充分利用開場時領前的優勢。

sentences.english: This sheeting has excellent entrance angularity, which is typical of encapsulated lens glass bead sheeting.
sentences.chinese: 具有更優秀的入射角，這也正是玻璃微珠的優勢所在。

sentences.english: Thirdly, to obtain employment successfully, ex-servicemen should bring into play their predominance themselves too.
sentences.chinese: 再者，退役軍人在就業時也應當注意發揮自身優勢。

sentences.english: The winner's edge is all in the attitude, not aptitude.
sentences.chinese: 贏者的優勢全在態度，而不在才智。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhu has an advantage over Mr.
sentences.chinese: 相比魏先生，朱旭亮還有些“優勢”。

sentences.english: The Western victors, however, have secured no such advantages.
sentences.chinese: 然而西方的勝利者卻無此優勢可佔。

sentences.english: The behavior of good soil field holding capacity on the tableland area is the superior advantage of ecological conditions for this region.
sentences.chinese: 臺原土壤優良持水特性是黃土旱源優勢的生態條件。

sentences.english: The part of 3th discusses the role of the theory of comparative advantage for Chinese foreign trade .
sentences.chinese: 第三部分論述了比較優勢理論對中國對外貿易的作用。

sentences.english: What advantage melanism brings in these circumstances is obscure.
sentences.chinese: 在這些環境中表皮黑化到底有什麼優勢似乎模糊不清。

sentences.english: Another advantage in Russia is consistency, Bulcke said.
sentences.chinese: 薄凱說，俄羅斯的另外一個優勢是政策的一致性。

sentences.english: Calcium formate may offer significant advantages as a dietary calcium supplement.
sentences.chinese: 提示甲酸鈣可能是一種極有優勢的鈣補充劑。

sentences.english: You can probably see the obvious advantages to structuring your information this way.
sentences.chinese: 您大概可以看出用該方法構造信息結構的明顯優勢。

sentences.english: Both advantages and disadvantages are existing in the development process of Renhe town of Gaoming city.
sentences.chinese: 高明市人和鎮的產業發展既有不足，也有發展優勢。

sentences.english: The perylene-series products of the Company has the absolute advantage in domestic and overseas markets.
sentences.chinese: 公司產品在國內外市場具有絕對優勢。

sentences.english: Do you feel you have the edge over McLaren here?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得在這裏和邁克拉倫相比你更有優勢嗎？

definition: to display/to exhibit/to bring out implicit or innate qualities/to express (a thought or moral)/to develop (an idea)/to elaborate (on a theme)
Ziyuan county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi
natural resource (such as water or minerals)/resource (such as manpower or tourism)
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
